structural_unit_name.en: School of Economics and Business Administration

type.en: Course with defence at the end

description.en: Independent scientific research in the student's field of study in the form of scientific research article. The research paper must correspond to the requirements of the School of Economics and Business Administration and it will be defended in a public defence in front of the defence committee.
description.et: Iseseisev teaduslik uurimistöö erialal teadusartikli kujul. Uurimistöö vastab majandusteaduskonnas esitatud nõuetele ning kaitstakse avalikul väitlusel kaitsmiskomisjoni ees.

objectives.en: The aim of the master thesis is to apply the knowledge and skills obtained in earlier courses to the profound analysis of a particular economic issue. During the writing of the thesis students can obtain deeper knowledge in the economics field which in turn offers them possibilities for further specialization during their studies. Writing the thesis enables students to gain experience of independent research work and obtain the skills necessary to write written research report in the form of a scientific research article.
objectives.et: Eesmärgiks on rakendada ainetes omandatud teadmisi konkreetse majandusprobleemi põhjalikumaks analüüsiks, omandada sügavamaid teadmisi majandusega seotud valdkonnas pakkudes seeläbi täiendavaid spetsialiseerumisvõimalusi ning omandada iseseisva uurimistöö kogemus koos oskusega koostada uurimuslikku kirjalikku tööd teadusartikli formaadis.

learning_outcomes.en: After defending the master thesis, student has obtained the following skills:
*	Knows more deeply one narrower field within the speciality
learning_outcomes.et: *	tunneb sügavamalt ühte eriala kitsamat valdkonda;

learning_outcomes.en: *	Is able to critically analyse the various standpoints published in the special literature
learning_outcomes.et: *	oskab kriitiliselt analüüsida erialakirjanduses avaldatud seisukohti

learning_outcomes.en: *	Is able to present own standpoints, conclusions and generalisations, and also justify these with arguments
learning_outcomes.et: *	oskab esitada oma seisukohti, järeldusi ning üldistusi ja neid argumenteeritult põhjendada;

learning_outcomes.en: *	Is able to investigate and analyse empirical material
learning_outcomes.et: *	oskab uurida ja analüüsida empiirilist materjali;

learning_outcomes.en: *	Is able to defend one's standpoints and to critically evaluate these
learning_outcomes.et: *	oskab kaitsta oma seisukohti ja esitatud teese ning neid kriitiliselt hinnata;

learning_outcomes.en: *	Is able to apply different research methods
learning_outcomes.et: *	oskab rakendada erinevaid teadusliku uurimistöö meetodeid;

learning_outcomes.en: *	Knows the requirements for research papers

grade_evaluation.et: Hinne kujuneb magistritöö ja selle kaitsmise alusel.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
